thread.title: The latest X-Files trailer asks a grave question: What if Mulder and Scully's work was a lie?
thread.title_full: The latest X-Files trailer asks a grave question: What if Mulder and Scully's work was a lie?

title: The latest X-Files trailer asks a grave question: What if Mulder and Scully's work was a lie?
text: 0 Cult News The latest X-Files trailer asks a grave question: What if Mulder and Scully's work was a lie? Tuesday, Oct 20 2015, 07:39 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Mulder and Scully are back in a new teaser for The X-Files , but not everything is as it seems.The truth is definitely still out there, as the new 30-second clip sees Mulder ( David Duchovny ) suggesting everything we know about the show could turn out to be a lie. This just aired during @Gotham ! Are you ready for January 24?! #TheXFiles
